text: Fatos Asllan Beja (born 29 November 1948 in Vlorë) is a member of the Assembly of the Republic of Albania for the Democratic Party of Albania. Beja is from 2009 the Chairman of the Committee on Foreign Policy of Albania. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Democratic Party of Albania politicians Category:1948 births Category:Members of the Parliament of Albania Category:People from Vlorë Category:21st-century Albanian politicians
title: Fatos Beja
